achievement.message: Congratulations on your achievement! Your creativity knows no bounds.
achievement.title: Well done!

celebration.message: It's time to celebrate your successes! You've accomplished something special.
celebration.title: Celebration!

educational.message: The teleprompter can improve your presentation by 40%. Give it a try!
educational.title: Did you know?

feature_discovery.message: Have you tried our new feature? It could transform your workflow.
feature_discovery.title: Discovery

feedback_request.message: What do you think of Naya? Your feedback helps us improve.
feedback_request.title: Your opinion matters

milestone.message: You are approaching an important goal. Just a little more effort!
milestone.title: Milestone reached!

motivation.message: Every script is a step towards your goal. You are making remarkable progress!
motivation.title: Keep going!

re_engagement.message: Glad to see you again! Let's pick up where you left off.
re_engagement.title: Welcome back!

reminder.message: Don't forget to save your important scripts to your favorites.
reminder.title: Reminder

seasonal.message: Take advantage of this time to create memorable content!
seasonal.title: Special moment

tip.message: Use AI to turn your ideas into structured scripts in seconds.
tip.title: Tip

welcome.message: Delighted to welcome you to Naya! Let's create captivating scripts together.
welcome.title: Welcome!
